name: pcrypto
description: Simple text encryption and decryption in the browser

scripts.build: rimraf build && tsc && browserify build/pcrypto.global.js -o build/pcrypto.global.bundle.js && npm test && echo Done build.
scripts.test-debug: echo Launching web server for: http://localhost:8844/ && browserify build/pcrypto.test.js | tape-run --port 8844
